Html: Love the tool!  One minor problem, if there is a picture in the document header then the redaction tool will hang up at the end of the process.  While it took a while to figure out what was happening, it is easy to work around - delete the picture from your header before "Redact document", then when the new document is complete simply go in and add back the picture.  Hopefully they can fix the bug but if not still an amazing tool!  Much mahalo (many thanks), Damon
Great catch! I believe I have a fix for this - I'll compile and post a 1.1 beta version this weekend that should address it.

Tristan,

I also found that it struggled if I redacted merged cells in a table and/or table headers - when I took the merged header out of the redaction then it worked fine.

Many thanks for the quick work on the new beta!
Damon

From: [email removed]

Subject: Re: Crashes with picture in document header [redaction:66687]

From: tristand
Great catch! I believe I have a fix for this - I'll compile and post a 1.1 beta version this weekend that should address it.

interesting - is this problem also in headers? does the redaction fail, hang, or just take a long time? would you be able to provide a sample file with dummy content that experiences this (I can't reproduce it)?

Finally replicated. In this file when I run it I get a generic error message "an error was encountered while redacting this document". I ran it several times with no problem testing various things (table going across pages, etc...); error did not happen until I merged the box in the header.

The tool rocks, saved me some serious time over the past week!
